unnormalised: Hey guys, anyone read Sachin Tendulkar's bio? Real inspiration, isn't it? Talk about dedication! Reminds me of "Chak De! India", just pure grit. My cousin, Rohan, at IIT Delhi, is obsessed with Dhoni's story. Heard Sania Mirza has a good one too. Planning to check it out. What are your faves? Any other gems from Indian athletes?
